debates.showAs: Information on Repairability of Certain Products Bill 2024: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Information on Repairability of Certain Products Bill 2024: Second Stage
Information on Repairability of Certain Products Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide that information relating to the repairability of certain products be made available and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú chun go ndéanfar faisnéis a bhaineann le hindeisitheacht táirgí áirithe a chur ar fáil agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Information on Repairability of Certain Products Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Fhaisnéis maidir le hIndeisitheacht Táirgí Áirithe, 2024

debates.showAs: Criminal Justice (Promotion of Restorative Justice) (Amendment) Bill 2023: Second Stage [Private Members]
Criminal Justice (Promotion of Restorative Justice) (Amendment) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Criminal Justice (Victims of Crime) Act 2017 to permit and encourage courts to refer cases to restorative justice schemes between charge and conviction, and to dismiss charges if appropriate; to encourage courts to refer cases to restorative justice schemes between conviction and sentencing; to permit and encourage An Garda Síochána and the Director of Public Prosecutions to refer cases to restorative justice schemes between charge and court, and to review the decision to prosecute if appropriate; and to make related provisions.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Cheartas Coiriúil (Íospartaigh na Coireachta), 2017 chun a cheadú do chúirteanna, agus chun cúirteanna a spreagadh, cásanna a tharchur chuig scéimeanna um cheartas aisig idir tráth an chúisimh agus tráth an chiontaithe, agus cúisimh a dhíbhe, más cuí; do spreagadh cúirteanna chun cásanna a tharchur chuig scéimeanna um cheartas aisig idir tráth an chiontaithe agus gearradh na pianbhreithe; dá cheadú don Gharda Síochána agus don Stiúrthóir Ionchúiseamh Poiblí, agus dá spreagadh, cásanna a tharchur chuig scéimeanna um cheartas aisig idir tráth an chúisimh agus tráth na cúirte, agus d’athbhreithniú na breithe chun ionchúiseamh a dhéanamh, más cuí; agus do dhéanamh forálacha gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Criminal Justice (Promotion of Restorative Justice) (Amendment) Bill 2023
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Cheartas Coiriúil (Ceartas Aisig a Chur chun Cinn) (Leasú), 2023

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to regulate the sale of nitrous oxide gas by prohibiting its sale in a reusable cylinder or disposable cartridge to a person who has not attained the age of 18 years and for that purpose to amend the Child Care Act 1991 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun díol gáis ocsaíde nítriúla a rialáil trí thoirmeasc a chur lena dhíol i sorcóir in-athúsáidte nó i gcartús indiúscartha le duine nach bhfuil 18 mbliana d’aois slánaithe aige nó aici agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta um Chúram Leanaí, 1991 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Green Hydrogen Strategy Bill 2022: Second Stage [Private Members]
Green Hydrogen Strategy Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to require the Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications to draft and publish a hydrogen strategy within six months of the passing of this Act.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá cheangal ar an Aire Comhshaoil, Aeráide agus Cumarsáide straitéis hidrigine a dhréachtú agus a fhoilsiú laistigh de shé mhí tar éis an tAcht seo a rith.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Straitéis Hidrigine Glaise, 2022

debates.showAs: Criminal Justice (Public Order) (Quadbikes and Scramblers) (Amendment) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Criminal Justice (Public Order) (Quadbikes and Scramblers) (Amendment) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Road Traffic Acts 1961 to 2020 to give Gardaí the power to seize and detain quad bikes and scrambler motorcycles when being used unlawfully including in public parks and green spaces and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú na nAchtanna um Thrácht ar Bhóithre, 1961 go 2020 chun an chumhacht a thabhairt do Ghardaí cuadrothair agus gluaisrothair streachailte a urghabháil agus a choinneáil nuair a úsáidtear go neamhdhleathach iad, lena n-áirítear i bpáirceanna poiblí agus i spásanna glasa, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Criminal Justice (Public Order) (Quadbikes and Scramblers) (Amendment) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Cheartas Coiriúil (Ord Poiblí) (Cuadrothair agus Gluaisrothair Streachailte) (Leasú), 2021

debates.showAs: Organisation of Working Time (Domestic Violence Leave) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for a period of paid leave as a consequence of domestic violence and for that purpose to amend the Organisation of Working Time Act 1997, to extend as a consequence the protection against unfair dismissals conferred by the Unfair Dismissals Acts 1977 to 2015 and to provide for the consequential amendment of certain other enactments; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le tréimhse saoire le pá de dhroim foréigean baile agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta um Eagrú Ama Oibre, 1997, do leathnú na cosanta, dá dhroim sin, ar dhífhostú éagórach a thugtar leis na hAchtanna um Dhífhostú Éagórach, 1977 go 2015 agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le leasú iarmhartach a dhéanamh ar achtacháin áirithe eile; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Organisation of Working Time (Domestic Violence Leave) Bill 2019
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Eagrú Ama Oibre (Saoire Foréigin Baile), 2019

debates.showAs: Organisation of Working Time (Workers Rights and Bogus Self-Employment) (Amendment) Bill 2019: Leave to Withdraw
Organisation of Working Time (Workers Rights and Bogus Self-Employment) (Amendment) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Organisation of Working Time Act 1997 to prohibit the practice of designating employment as self-employment; to bring the Garda Síochána, the Defence Forces, and doctors in training, under the protection of the Act; to limit the race to the bottom on workers rights by extending elements of the Act to the self-employed; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Eagrú Ama Oibre, 1997 chun an cleachtas arb éard é fostaíocht a shainainmniú mar fhéinfhostaíocht a thoirmeasc; do thabhairt an Gharda Síochána, Óglaigh na hÉireann agus ábhar dochtúirí faoi chosaint an Achta; do chur teorainn leis an gclaonadh chun donais i dtaca le cearta oibrithe trí ghnéithe den Acht a leathnú chuig daoine féinfhostaithe; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Organisation of Working Time (Workers Rights and Bogus Self-Employment) (Amendment) Bill 2019
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Eagrú Ama Oibre (Cearta Oibrithe agus Féinfhostaíocht Bhréagach) (Leasú), 2019

debates.showAs: Sale of Tickets (Sporting and Cultural Events) Bill 2017: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Sale of Tickets (Sporting and Cultural Events) Bill 2017: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Sale of Tickets (Sporting and Cultural Events) Bill 2017: Second Stage [Private Members]
Sale of Tickets (Sporting and Cultural Events) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to regulate the selling of tickets for certain sporting and cultural events; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do rialáil díolachán ticéad le haghaidh imeachtaí áirithe spóirt agus cultúir; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Sale of Tickets (Sporting and Cultural Events) Bill 2017
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Dhíol Ticéad (Imeachtaí Spóirt agus Cultúir), 2017
